title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 September 2016 - XWiki
content:
<DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
00:18 <vmassol> has quit  
00:44 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
00:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
00:51 <vmassol> has quit  
01:39 <Denis> has quit  
03:09 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:11 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
07:09 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:04 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <rfidna> has joined #xwiki  
08:11 <rfidna> Hi, I am having a problem in XWiki 7.4.4 - after deleting a Page it still shows up in the Navigation Bar and is shown at the 'Page Index' -> 'Tree' tab. On navigating to the menu entry it says: 'The requested page could not be found.' how can i delete this ghost entries from the navigation?  
08:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <rfidna> Hi, I am having a problem in XWiki 7.4.4 - after deleting a Page it still shows up in the Navigation Bar and is shown at the 'Page Index' -> 'Tree' tab. On navigating to the menu entry it says: 'The requested page could not be found.' how can i delete this ghost entries from the navigation?  
08:50 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:03 <rfidna> Hi, I am having a problem in XWiki 7.4.4 - after deleting a Page it still shows up in the Navigation Bar and is shown at the 'Page Index' -> 'Tree' tab. On navigating to the menu entry it says: 'The requested page could not be found.' how can i delete this ghost entries from the navigation?  
09:10 <evalica> rfidna: there might be some hidden children pages, that's why it might be still displayed in the Tree  
09:11 <vmassol> rfidna: hi  
09:11 <evalica> you should change the Profile type to view hidden pages and delete them also (if you don't need them). You might not have check to also delete children, when you deleted the page.  
09:12 <vmassol> I think it just means that you deled the page but it has children  
09:12 <evalica> If there are no children, there might be some hidden translations for that page. Investigate these 2 options.  
09:12 <vmassol> \*deleted  
09:13 <rfidna> thank you let me check this  
09:19 <rfidna> well I have no idea if i just cannot find the hidden elements or if there are no such elements  
09:29 <vmassol> rfidna: if you wish to display hidden docs, see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/User+Profile+Application#HEditPreferences  
09:30 <vmassol> @evalica: from a UX POV, I think we could improve the doc tree to display a message like "5 hidden documents" when there's no children nodes under a node  
09:30 <vmassol> I'll create a jira issue  
09:31 <evalica> k  
09:32 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <vmassol> testing first ;)  
09:33 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> Hello there, I'm having a problem with xwiki rights, I can't manage to take out Wiki admin right from XWikiAllGroup, could someone send me the default rights?  
09:34 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> I mean the object one, I think I messed it up  
09:35 <vmassol> rfidna/evalica: first, when you dleete a page you'll be shown hidden children pages even if your user is configured to not display hidden pages  
09:35 <vmassol> let's imagine I didn't see it...  
09:36 <vmassol> hmm no it works fine  
09:36 <vmassol> the doc tree works fine  
09:36 <vmassol> it doesn't the parent entry if it's been deleted and children are empty  
09:36 <evalica> so if the problem ar not children, you should check for translations  
09:36 <vmassol> s/empty/hidden  
09:36 <vmassol> i don't think that's the problem iether  
09:36 <evalica> for example, if you delete Sandbox…. it will still be displayed  
09:37 <evalica> since Sandbox has a lot of translation pages  
09:37 <vmassol> translations would appear in the tree under a Translation node  
09:37 <evalica> if the tree is configured to display translations, but the navigation tree is using compact mode, with less informations  
09:38 <vmassol> so rfidna, what tree are you using?  
09:38 <vmassol> "'Page Index' -> 'Tree' tab."  
09:38 <vmassol> so evalica it's not the breadcrumb tree  
09:38 <vmassol> and that tree displays Translations under a Translations node  
09:39 <rfidna> @vmassol "'Page Index' -> 'Tree' tab." is right  
09:39 <vmassol> I think what happened  
09:39 <vmassol> is that you have a WebPreferences page for your page  
09:39 <vmassol> (ie you played with page administration)  
09:39 <vmassol> and when you deleted the page you didn't deleted children  
09:39 <rfidna> yes i did ... on one of the entries i can not delete  
09:40 <vmassol> anyway  
09:40 <vmassol> turn on hidden docs  
09:40 <vmassol> as i mentioned  
09:40 <rfidna> they are enabled  
09:40 <rfidna>  -> shown  
09:40 <evalica> why can't you delete it? are you admin?  
09:40 <rfidna> yes I am  
09:40 <vmassol> can you imgur an screenshot of what you see?  
09:40 <rfidna> I am just installing greenshot ;)  
09:42 <vmassol> ah  
09:42 <vmassol> what version are you using?  
09:42 <vmassol> 7.4.4  
09:42 <vmassol> hmmm  
09:42 <vmassol> wondering if there have been fixes after that version  
09:43 <vmassol> could that issue be your problem for dleete: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13688  
09:44 <vmassol> it would be nice if you could upgrade o 7.4.5  
09:44 <rfidna> I am operating as admin  
09:44 <rfidna> well okay I will upgrade - let me take some screenshots for you before  
09:45 <vmassol> FYI I'm testing on XWiki 8.4SNAPSHOT and I cannot reproduce your scenario  
09:45 <vmassol> would need to test with 7.4.4 but I need to work on somerthing right now  
09:49 <rfidna> well here the images:  
09:49 <rfidna> 1) Navigation tree - shown to guests:  
09:49 <rfidna> http://imgur.com/63Ry9CV  
09:50 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> hi there guys, any ideas about the problem regarding the XWikiAllGroup rights not working?  
09:50 <rfidna> 2) As admin (hidden elements shown)  
09:50 <rfidna> http://imgur.com/PK1G5YS  
09:50 <vmassol> rfidna: when you clck on it  
09:50 <vmassol> could you give us the URL you get?  
09:51 <rfidna> 3) The page that is not deleted http://imgur.com/2sropAl  
09:51 <vmassol> I'm wondering if you're not under a bad tomcat version  
09:51 <vmassol> and seeing the url would show this  
09:52 <rfidna> http://xwiki.intern.sai-schweiger.de/xwiki/bin/delete/Main/SAI%2BAutomatisierung/  
09:52 <vmassol> (bad tomcat versions have issues with spaces)  
09:52 <rfidna> let me check the version from cli ;)  
09:53 <rfidna> ^^ the url above is not reachable from the www  
09:53 <vmassol> yes please  
09:53 <vmassol> (sure np)  
09:53 <vmassol> %2B is + , that should be ok normally even thuogh it's wrong technically (i've fixed this btw but I don't remember in which version)  
09:54 <vmassol> can you try a URL  
09:54 <vmassol> that URL  
09:54 <vmassol> but  
09:54 <vmassol> replacing %2B with a %20  
09:54 <vmassol> and see if the page exists  
09:54 <rfidna> same issue page does not exist  
09:55 <vmassol> ok so must be something else, re tomcat version check http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationTomcat (the red box)  
09:55 <vmassol> but I don't think that's the issue  
09:56 <rfidna> sh bin/version.sh Using CATALINA\_BASE:   /usr/share/tomcat Using CATALINA\_HOME:   /usr/share/tomcat Using CATALINA\_TMPDIR: /usr/share/tomcat/temp Using JRE\_HOME:        /usr Using CLASSPATH:       /usr/share/tomcat/bin/bootstrap.jar:/usr/share/tomcat/bin/tomcat-juli.jar Server version: Apache Tomcat/8.0.35 Server built:   May 11 2016 21:57:08 UTC Server number:  8.0.35.0 OS Name:        Linux OS Version:     4.4.19-1-pve Architecture  
09:56 <rfidna> http://pastebin.com/31L9f8GW  
09:56 <vmassol> 8.0.35  
09:57 <vmassol> ok so that's a bad one  
09:57 <vmassol> you'll get other problems with it :)  
09:57 <vmassol> you should not use a version later than 8.0.34 on the 8.0.x branch  
09:57 <vmassol> they introduced a big regression startingin 8.0.35  
09:58 <vmassol> actually not sure about 8.0.34 itself  
09:58 <vmassol> I need to rephrase that box ;)  
09:58 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <vmassol> yes 8.0.34 is bad too  
09:58 <vmassol> "XWiki fails to work with Tomcat 7.0.69+ and 8.0.33+"  
09:59 <rfidna> the pasted box is in the pastebin link ...  
10:00 <vmassol> reworded  
10:01 <vmassol> so latest good for the 8.0.x branch is 8.0.33  
10:01 <vmassol> and then ping tomcat to fix the regression they introduced! :)  
10:01 <vmassol> (I already reported ti to them but they're not hurrying to fix it)  
10:01 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <rfidna> omg i spend days in testing xwiki and got out version 7xx has less issues than 8xx and now it turns out tomcat is the problem :D  
10:01 <vmassol> (even though they agreed it was a problem)  
10:02 <vmassol> note that I don't think this is what is causing your issue with your problem  
10:02 <vmassol> but still good to downgrade  
10:02 <vmassol> and retest  
10:03 <rfidna> then i will downgrade first  
10:04 <rfidna> thanks a lot for your help  
10:05 <vmassol> haha seems they committed a fix: https://github.com/apache/tomcat/commit/eb195bebac8239b994fa921aeedb136a93e4ccaf but for https://github.com/apache/tomcat/releases/tag/TOMCAT\_9\_0\_0\_M10  
10:06 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <rfidna> ^^ mhm i will rather downgrade then upgrade ;)  
10:08 <rfidna> maybe i will setup the entire vserver node again - any recommendations should i use v7 LTS rather than v8 ?  
10:09 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <vmassol> no idea  
10:12 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> hi, I'm still having trouble with the wiki administration right on allgroup at XWikiPreferences?editor=object  
10:13 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> can someone paste me the default settings of it?  
10:25 <Slashman> has quit  
10:39 <rfidna> Server version: Apache Tomcat/8.0.33  
10:40 <rfidna> The issue is still there  
10:41 <rfidna> i will upgrade to XWiki 7.4.5 now  
10:41 <vmassol> k  
10:47 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:50 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:36 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:51 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:28 <Slashman> has quit  
13:33 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
13:40 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:54 <rfidna> vmassol - thank you very much for your support. I set up version 8.2.1 using an compatible tomcat version. I love this project!  
14:54 <rfidna> caio  
14:58 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:58 <rfidna> has quit  
14:59 <Slashman> has quit  
15:16 <msmeria> has quit  
15:43 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
15:44 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
16:04 <vmassol> nice :)  
16:04 <vmassol> "thank you very much for your support. I set up version 8.2.1 using an compatible tomcat version. I love this project!" I love that!  
16:11 <evalica> :)  
16:12 <evalica> has quit  
16:14 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:19 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:40 <vmassol> guys, anyone knows how I can evaluate velocity from a velocity script in a wiki page without PR?  
16:40 <vmassol> seems we don't have the RenderTool in our velocity config (https://velocity.apache.org/tools/devel/apidocs/org/apache/velocity/tools/generic/RenderTool.html)  
16:40 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
17:00 <edvorg> has quit  
17:17 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
17:20 <Denis> has quit  
17:26 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:18 <vmassol> going to release new version of the RN app + upgrade xwiki.org  
18:41 <vmassol> ok done :)  
18:51 <ClemensR> has quit  
18:59 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
19:26 <vmassol> Pbas: how do you like the new RN page: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ ? Especially the "Custom Release Notes" section  
19:43 <edvorg> has quit  
20:07 <Slashman> has quit  
22:15 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
22:45 <vmassol> has quit
